title: CABBAGE AND SAUSAGE FOIL PACKETS
directions: Preheat your grill to 400 degrees F.
Cut four 18 x 12 inch sheets of foil. Spray well with non-stick spray.
Divide the cabbage, potatoes and onion over the foil sheets.
Add 1 ice cube to each mound.
Evenly divide the sausage between the packets and top with garlic butter (1-2 tablespoons per packet), salt and pepper.
Seal each packet well and place on grill.
Grill for 50 minutes flipping from the packets every 15 minutes.
Allow to rest 10 minutes before serving.
Serve with sour cream if desired.
These can be baked in the oven at 425 degrees for 35-40 minutes or until potatoes are fork tender. Potatoes sizes can vary, you’ll want just over 1 cup diced/cubed potato per serving.
If you are concerned that your foil may leak, double wrap your packets.
ingredients: 1 lb Polish sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces (or your favorite smoked sausage)
1/2 head of cabbage, cut into 1/2″ wedges
